component.name: OptionsData
component.script:
sub init() m.top.value_index = 0 end sub
sub update_title() for i=0 to m.top.choices.count() - 1 if m.top.choices[i].value = m.top.value m.top.value_index = i exit for end if end for m.top.title = m.top.base_title + ": " + m.top.choices[m.top.value_index].display end sub
sub press() max_opt = m.top.choices.count() i = m.top.value_index + 1 while i >= max_opt i = i - max_opt end while
m.top.value_index = i m.top.value = m.top.choices[m.top.value_index].value
set_user_setting(m.top.config_key, m.top.value) end sub
